pages.title: Creosote Oil
pages.text: To produce Creosote you need to burn $(l:sim_1/resources/1_minerals_and_ores#coal)Coal$() in a $(l:sim_1/3_creosote#coke_oven)Coke Oven$(), the process will produce $(item)Coal Coke$() aswell as the fluid byproduct which is called $(item)Creosote.$()$(br2)A $(l:sim_1/3_creosote#coke_oven)Coke Oven$() is built out of $(item)Coke Bricks$(), don't forget that $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$() can help you build it.
The dried bricks you so masterfully dried earlier can now be put to good use.

pages.title: Coke Oven Mats
pages.notes: $(item)Right click$() on the correct side with an $(item)Engineers Hammer$() to assemble once the structure is placed.

pages.text: This hammer is required to assemble all multiblock structures from $(item)Immersive Engineering.$()$(br2)Required knowledge:$(br)$(l:sim_1/knowledge/0_immersive)Engineering Knowledge$()

pages.title: Handling Liquids
pages.text: Once you unlock the $(l:sim_1/knowledge/0_immersive)Engineering Knowledge$() you get a Jerrycan, this is a sturdy vessel that can hold a good amount of both Hot and cold Liquids.$(br2)If it contains atleast 1000mb of Liquid it can place source blocks on the ground, but it cant pick up liquids.

pages.title: Creosote Uses
pages.description1: Drop some $(l:sim_1/resources/0_surface_level#gravel)Gravel$() in $(item)Creosote Oil$() to create $(item)Grout$().
pages.description2: Drop some $(item)Fir Wood Planks$() in $(item)Creosote Oil$() to create $(item)Treated Wood$().
